sentence: "If Herschel Walker wins in Georgia, you look at J.D.Vance in Ohio, and you really want to look at crazy?
author: Travis Gettys
title: Trump-endorsed 'freaks and liars' are making Republicans worried about midterm chances: Morning Joe

sentence: Vance in Ohio, Herschel Walker in Georgia and Mehmet Oz in Pennsylvania -- in races around the country, and the "Morning Joe" host said they're unlikely to win Democratic votes and might not excite enough Republican voters.
author: Travis Gettys
title: 'McConnell's worst nightmare': Morning Joe says Trump's 'bonkers' base is pushing for unelectable candidates
